  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="80083" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="80083" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.04</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="633">633</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="124"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Soleil de Feu</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Soleil de Feu</b> was launched in 2023. Soleil de Feu was created by Shyamala Maisondieu and Givaudan. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Soleil De Feu by Tom Ford is described asa smoldering amber woody scent evoking sunset light. It is the most sensual expression of Soleil according to the designer.The fragrance evokes the molten sun descending in a burnished blaze over the sea, painting the sky with fiery strokes of bronze solar light.</p>

<p>Notes of sandalwood are enhanced withtuberose accord and warm ambers, creating a seductive and sensual fragrance.</p>

<p>Notes:Tuberose, Sandalwood, Benzoin</p>

<p>"Soleil De Feu is a smoldering amber woody scent evoking sunset light. It is the most sensual expression of soleil."  Tom Ford.</p>

<p>It is available as a 30, 50, and 250 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369309" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="girlblogger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771509"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1771509.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="girlblogger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/TriBeCa-59904.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59904.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="TriBeCa"title="TriBeCa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771509">girlblogger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>NEVER get tired of this. Always in my rotation has been one of my favorites since the day I bought it. I bought it the second I smelled it and never looked back. Such a unique scentelegant, creamy, sweet, almost smells a little nuttyand Ive yet to come across another fragrance quite like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2369309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2369309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358461" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anduta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594143"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594143.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anduta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Thameen/Peregrina-59756.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59756.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Peregrina"title="Peregrina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594143">anduta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first 30 minutes are heavenly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2358461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2358461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356829" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jkiins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2268689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jkiins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268689">Jkiins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 14:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This isnt my usual kind of fragrance but I camt deny its a masterpiece. Reminds me of cinnamon and eggnog. Very warm and perfect for the upcoming holiday season. Very impressive longevity too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2356829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2356829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This smells very nostalgic and very aromatic. Perfect chai/cinnamon and spice smell that you won't smell anywhere. I agree with the warm hug remarks here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2338349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2338349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298719">Kcoolkat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 17:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really enjoy this one. Woody yet sweet. Not heavy in the tuberose- cant quite even tell floral is in here. Can be worn in any weather especially during the day. Its the smell of the sun warming against your skin. Probably good for layering with florals to give them a nice sandalwood base.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2327676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2327676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

The amber in this fragrance smells like someone topped it with sugar and cinnamon and brled it. Intoxicating and criminally underrated</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2325194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2325194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaSauvignonBlonde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205116.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaSauvignonBlonde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Benjoin-Boheme-40942.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40942.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Benjoin Bohme"title="Benjoin Bohme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205116">LaSauvignonBlonde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral vanilla top notes with the tiniest kiss of spice over a creamy wooden base. Its a solar amber. It reminds me of sitting in my paternal grandparents farmhouse kitchen in late September, and Im about to be served homemade apple cobbler with vanilla ice cream. <br />
<br />
Scent imagery: Sun-beat pastures sprinkled with flowers, gravel roads, southern cobbler w/ vanilla ice cream, spicy incense, an antique wooden hutch, farmhouse wallpaper, and a hint of sunscreen</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2316471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2316471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310601" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tasherapd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1763702.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tasherapd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Tilia-91688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tilia"title="Tilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763702">Tasherapd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 19:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very underrated. Ive always enjoyed smelling this one. It somehow reminds me of big red gum. I get a spicy cinnamon feel. This doesnt have a note of cinnamon and I normally hate cinnamon as a fragrance note, but somehow the sandalwood blends with the other notes to create that spicy smell &amp; it works in this fragrance. Then theres this slight toasted coconut essence. I would never have guessed that tuberose was a note. Idk how TF did it but this is a great blend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2310601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2310601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271664" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KillerBee123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KillerBee123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cacharel/Eden-244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eden"title="Eden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191445">KillerBee123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is HEAVEN in a bottle!<br />
I believe the last perfume Tom Ford crated before selling everything to Estee Lauder (If I am wrong about the timing - please correct me).<br />
Warm, sweet, sensual, sexy, feminine, golden, unusual, long lasting. Absolutely beautiful perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2271664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2271664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2236371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2236371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231301" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mtmer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183566"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mtmer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paloma-Picasso/Minotaure-1695.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1695.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Minotaure"title="Minotaure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231301ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231301" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183566">mtmer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-27">07/27/24 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this brings to mind the "feels" of Intuition for Men or Allure Homme in that this lighter, somewhat airy nature they all posess is constantly bringing you in closer for a stronger sniff of something nice.  That can be frustrating at times, sure, but a glass-half-full outlook allows you to see the versatility you gain, and I see Soliel de Feu as such an easy wear throughout the year.  This is a beauty, and unlike Intuition or Allure, SdF somehow manages to stick around being nice and serene for a surprisingly generous amount of time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Absolutely beautiful, almost stunning creamy natural santalwood with amber, cinnamon, a hint of tobacco. I also detect a dryied fruits note in the muddle of evolution. A cinpliment getter it makes you simy shy. <br />
As a non TF fragrance lover, vecause I found them not so longevive, this one could ve a happy exception for me. I got almost 8 hours ferm longevity with 4 sprays. What I also found interesting is that this fragrance works amazing in warm temperature as it works stunning in the cold nights. Must find a convenient price for a backup, I simply adore it. <br />
All the comparsions I see aboove on the "This perfume reminds me of" are disgustingly ridiculous...JPG Scandal?! These people who voted like this shoud be left without the right to vote anywhere....<br />
<br />
<br />
9 out of 10 rating</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2230688"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2230688#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You're now divine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2188052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2188052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171769" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karenX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.44536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karenX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-des-Sens-Eau-de-Toilette-35678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"title="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44536">karenX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 15:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminded me immediately and continually of a very strong-brewed chai. Knowing the notes, it's the sandalwood/amber combo, but I still smell chai. There's something a touch incense-y about it, as well. Although I love sandalwood and amber, I normally wouldn't go for something this thick/smoky/spicy. However, I love this and will reserve my bottle for when the weather starts to get cold again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2171769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2171769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A very warm ambery sandalwood that is perfect for chilly autumn and winter nights.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2171339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2171339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2151197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2151197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147047" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147047" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandNerdChic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/216191"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.216191.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandNerdChic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orphon Eau de Parfum"title="Orphon Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/216191">BandNerdChic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 23:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is incredibly spicy and so warm that it is actually molten. I picture an aunt who loves cheetah print, or a young mom who has her aesthetic together and loves to burn candles, or gorgeous girl who rides horses in the heat and then curls her hair to go out on the town. Something about this feels very Texas, and I dont know what that means but Im sticking to it! There is just enough wood in here that a man in a grey suit and a nice watch would wear it too - especially if he works in an office with a lot of mahogany furniture.<br />
<br />
On someone who prefers intimate fresh and woody fragrances, I actually find myself really appreciating this but I think I could only find a handful of occasions a year where I would feel comfortable pulling this off. I would love it on my made up horse girl, though!<br />
<br />
I have a rather full 30 mL for sale/swap :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2147047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2147047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's so simple and smells simple but in the best way possible</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2141777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2141777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2121152" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ground hound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ground hound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Iris-Shot-54869.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54869.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Shot"title="Iris Shot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2121152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2121152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008">Ground hound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 03:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Once the smoke note fades out this whole thing turns into Soleil Neige..(?)<br />
The smoke note is the same type used in Mancera Black Candy to create a licorice effect.<br />
Warm smoky floral but more towards smoked than burnt.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2121152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2121152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119792" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wondervalley666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="wondervalley666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salum-Parfums/Cocoyster-90755.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90755.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cocoyster"title="Cocoyster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461605">wondervalley666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens smelling almost identical to Desert Suave by Liquides Imaginaries, like beast mode spiced dates. Dries down rapidly much softer, to a sandalwood scent, a bit powdery. Looses a lot of sweet but retains a light warm spicy accord. I dont get tuberose here. I mostly detect wood with some ambery resins And spice. Overall nice, I didnt initially think it was very interesting but it gets addictive. I like it! Not sure if I need a bottle but I will be revisiting this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2119792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2119792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2117800" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2117800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2117800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 01:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cinnamony fragrance which reminds me of late summer turning into autumn. Warm, woody and inviting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2117800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2117800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107553" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sdbr_go"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951741.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sdbr_go" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56737.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soleil Neige"title="Soleil Neige"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951741">sdbr_go</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 23:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a well-blended Amber Woody fragrance that's best for cool places and nighttime. I think that this can be worn during the day, but it won't get noticed as much since it's smooth and airy.<br />
<br />
The first time I sprayed this was at school right outside our classroom. It was a small hallway so I kind of get that my friends near me could get some whiffs out of it. Two of them immediately said that it smelled good, and I was kind of not convinced since I just blind-bought it, so I was still trying to force myself to like it.<br />
<br />
Almost a month later, I fully wore it on my cotton t-shirt. It's woody and slightly spicy in the opening, but it's incredibly smooth, so you get that sensual feel to it. After a day, I still smell it from that same t-shirt (which I just hung after using it for about 30 minutes), but now it smelled creamy. It slowly came to me that it was the smell of tuberose, and I realized that I actually like the smell of tuberose!<br />
<br />
Overall, this perfume isn't much of a performer, but it does announce its presence with a unique scent. I have never smelled anything like this before, so nothing comes to mind when smell this. I also think that it lasts long enough (at least for me). 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2107553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2107553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080262" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StringerSmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2041188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="StringerSmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); Definitely feminine leaning but boy is it good on my wife and the sillage is fantastic, you can smell it across the room (in a good way). Very unique summer scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2080262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2080262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2049606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2049606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046774" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="*loves_shoes*"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="*loves_shoes*" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258">*loves_shoes*</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 10:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the best thing Ive smelled in a long while. And the most surprising, in a good way. <br />
Ive never smelled anything like this combination of a slightly fresh almost cucumber feel in a spicy warm sandalwood. It sounds like it shouldnt work, but it does. <br />
<br />
Its magnificent. <br />
<br />
Really evokes the feeling of a holiday evening, when you dont have time to wash your hair and hit the bar straight after a shower at the beach, with the smell of he sea still in your hair mixing with your warm ambery sandalwood perfume and the soft whisper of white florals and coconut from your shower gel. <br />
<br />
Love. Love. Love. <br />
<br />
Safe blind buy if you like sandalwood. <br />
I bought a 50ml and its worth every penny.<br />
<br />
Dry down is toasted coconut.<br />
<br />
To add: I put maybe 6 sprays on my skin at 8am this morning, it was still projecting in a meeting at 3pm, and I can still smell it on my skin at 6pm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2046774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2046774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035955" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzylana1996"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1782344.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzylana1996" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035955ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035955" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782344">suzylana1996</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is HOT. Well done Mr. Ford! Finally a fragrance with sandalwood done right. It opens with a burst of warm spices then the creamy sandal wood and a touch of white florals come to play, then finally a slightly burnt resinous and woodsy essence creeps in. Its sexy, warm, perfectly sweet, so well blended and performs beautifully as well. Perfect for intimate occasions or on a night out but I can see myself wearing this at anytime. Bravo TF</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2035955"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2035955#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nocciola23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1466858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nocciola23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-55997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466858">Nocciola23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 02:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a really interesting and underrated scent. It's not summer in a bottle, as the other Soleil perfumes by TF seem to be, and having the same colour bottle as Soleil neige and Soleil Blanc, this one goes well under the radar.<br />
Its a dense, balsamic sandalwood and tuberose that feels really familiar and comfortable to me. It doesn't remind me of another scent, it just feels warm and comforting.<br />
Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2033375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2033375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2031636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2031636" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Notedecoeur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1686417"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1686417.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Notedecoeur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2031636ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2031636" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1686417">Notedecoeur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-15">01/15/24 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my kind of summer sun. <br />
Soleil Blanc always punches me in the face with the tuberose and Jasmin mix, as if someone was shouting `sUmMEr!!!!!!!` into your ear (or nose?) which really puts me off. Soleil de Feu, however, smells absolutely exquisite - transports me instantly to the pleasure of enjoying cold Ros on a fun, carefree, summer afternoon in one of Ibiza`s elegant chiringuitos while wearing whites and beiges. <br />
Good performance on me (like usually with TF perfumes), interesting, evolving composition, vividly present without being heavy. Well played florals - not obvious, but absolutely vital. Price point of TF always sparks a conversation but it is very, very, very hard to find worthy and quality alternatives. My dream is to have a full collection of all my TF favourites organised by colour on my perfume shelf... Well - one of my dreams ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2031636"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2031636#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sweet, woody, spicy. Just waiting for it to hit discounters and I'll put it in my regular rotation- retail prices are insane.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2028421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2028421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018360" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; on YouTube! Hmmph My friend that works at Tom Ford gave me what I guess was a 3 ml decant of this and It all leaked out in the driver side door of my new corvette!! &amp; there where no complaints from me at all I learned it was def a unisex fragrance &amp; It smelled awesome in there almost for 3 months! And in Houston They say they stay sold out of it and I can most definitely see why! Even though It was the cold month of January 2023 &amp; Ive kept on putting this one off thru out the whole year. But not too much longer. It has a reminder of that super expensive indoor tanning lotions prior to getting in the tanning booth. The whole Ambery tropical smell that smells completely unisex to me &amp; something I envision rocking at an outdoor party on a summer night &amp; If you happen to have the swag to match This one should definitely garner you some compliments for sure!! I will have it in my collection before the hot Texas summer of 2024 gets here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="80083"comment_id="2015402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-de-Feu-80083.html?ccid=2015402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013147" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
